tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WaterConsumption (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    area_name VARCHAR(255),
    consumption_gallon DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE ProductionSchedule (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    production_rate DECIMAL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE WaterUsageHistory (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    area_name VARCHAR(255),
    usage_gallon DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE MachineDetails (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    machine_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceLogs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    machine_id INT,
    description TEXT,
    log_date DATE
)
